chapter.title: Additional Portlet Resources
chapter.para:
The architecture of GridSphere and API definitions of key portlet concepts matches the portlet API provided by IBM WebSphere to a large extent. An excellent source of more information on portlets and portlet development is the WebSphere Portlet Zone and the following IBM WebSphere documents:
IBM WebSphere 4.X Portlet Developer's Guide.
he Case for Portlets http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/ibm/library/i-portletintro/
Portlet Application Programming http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/ibm/library/i-portal/ http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/ibm/library/i-portal2/
